name: Asteria (itch)
description:
First and foremost, thank you for taking the time to check out our first Early Access Game. It's taken us a while to get to a point where we felt it was ready for the general public.

As the short description says, this is an Early Access Top-Down Open World Space Shooter. It's still in very early development so please be prepared for bugs. Your continued support and comments will help us greatly improve the game.
